title: 苦力怕光影不匹配换不掉
author: popgirl
txt_content:
我在国服买的苦力怕，导出后用在电脑国际服然后就变成这样了
设置打不开
如何去掉？








QQ截图20200410180946.png
(34.72 KB, 下载次数: 0)




下载附件


2020-4-10 18:10 上传

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
打开 C:\Users\用户名\AppData\Local\Packages\Microsoft.MinecraftUWP_8wekyb3d8bbwe\LocalState\games\com.mojang\resource_packs

删掉对应的文件试试

replies.author: popgirl
replies.txt_content:
xmdhs 发表于 2020-4-10 18:34
打开 C:%users\用户名\AppData\Local\Packages\Microsoft.MinecraftUWP_8wekyb3d8bbwe\LocalState\games\co ...
谢，成功了
